column4: Hi channel. I want to *upgrade* my Firefox 3.X install to 4.0. Upgrade - as in overwrite. How can I do this?
Just download the firefox 4 from the website, remove firefox the package, and make a symlink to firefox4 in /usr/local/bin
firefox4 is not in the repo.  See my previous post.  I can help more if you need it.
